```{r}
#| label: Tidying data

# Extracting relevant variables

Cats_Dataset <- dataset |>
  select(Age, Breed, `Weight (lbs)`, Diet, Stress, `Previous UO`, Difficulty, `Size of u-cath`, Hematuria, `Duration of signs (days)`, `Repeat UO?`) |>
  rename(Weight = `Weight (lbs)`,
         Hx = `Previous UO`,
         C_Size = `Size of u-cath`,
         Sx_Days = `Duration of signs (days)`,
         Repeat = `Repeat UO?`)
```
